ovdesc.p: AZ AZ.REPAY.ACCOUNT AZ.REPAY.ACCOUNT This file stores the list of az.accounts that share the same repay account. This is used during loan repayment to appropriate the credit into the repay account using the rules defined in AZ.SETTLEMENT.PRIORITY.
Key to this applications. Holds the repayment account ID.
Holds the AZ ACCOUNTs for which the ID account is repayment account

desc.p: Key to this applications. Holds the repayment account ID.
Holds the AZ ACCOUNTs for which the ID account is repayment account
